amendment.description: Page 138, after line 9, insert the following (and conform the table of contents accordingly): SEC. 318. MINIMUM STAFFING OF AIR TRAFFIC CONTROLLERS. ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numberedd 11 printed in House Report 112-46 to require a minimum of three on duty air traffic controllers.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
